Attributes.description: Critical examination of mainstream and alternative media images of gender, race, and sexuality in the context of networked social media, film, music, and television.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of GRSJ 101, GRSJ 102 or (b) all of WMST 101, WMST 102. (or third-year standing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 12:30, End Time: 14:00, Building: To, Room: Be
